org.opendaylight.controller.forwarding.staticrouting

Interface IForwardingStaticRouting

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StaticRoutingImplementation

    public interface IForwardingStaticRouting
    This Interface provides APIs to manage and query the static routes

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Status addStaticRoute(StaticRouteConfig config)
      Adds a StaticRouteConfig
      StaticRoute getBestMatchStaticRoute(java.net.InetAddress ipAddress)
      Retrieves the StaticRoute that has the longest prefix matching the ipAddress.
      java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap<java.lang.String,StaticRouteConfig> getStaticRouteConfigs()
      Returns all the StaticRouteConfig
      Status removeStaticRoute(java.lang.String name)
      Removes the named StaticRouteConfig

    • Method Detail

      • getBestMatchStaticRoute

        StaticRoute getBestMatchStaticRoute(java.net.InetAddress ipAddress)
        Retrieves the StaticRoute that has the longest prefix matching the ipAddress.

        ipAddress - (InetAddress) the IP address
        Returns:
        StaticRoute

        java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap<java.lang.String,StaticRouteConfig> getStaticRouteConfigs()
        Returns all the StaticRouteConfig
        Returns:

      • addStaticRoute

        Status addStaticRoute(StaticRouteConfig config)
        Adds a StaticRouteConfig
        Parameters:
        config: - the StaticRouteConfig to be added
        Returns:
        a text string indicating the result of the operation.. If the operation is successful, the return string will be "SUCCESS"

      • removeStaticRoute

        Status removeStaticRoute(java.lang.String name)
        Removes the named StaticRouteConfig
        Parameters:
        name: - the name of the StaticRouteConfig to be removed
        Returns:
        a text string indicating the result of the operation. If the operation is successful, the return string will be "SUCCESS"
